content.title: Educational Assistance (Scheme for the Pre-Matric and Post-Matric Scholarship to Children of Construction Workers Registered with the MBOCWWB)
content.beneficiary: Children of construction workers registered with the Meghalaya Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board
content.details: The Educational Assistance scheme provides scholarships in the form of financial assistance to children of construction workers registered under the Board for Pre-Matric and Post-Matric studies. The scholarships are applicable for courses of study specified by the Board from time to time.
benefits: Monthly stipend ranging from ₹400 to ₹1,600 depending on the level of study
Additional ₹200 per month for blind students
eligibility: Engaged in building or other construction work
Registered under the Meghalaya Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board
Children must be enrolled in any grade from Class I to Degree Course
Children must not be in receipt of any other financial assistance from any other source
Only two children of the same parents/guardians are entitled to receive scholarships
exclusions: Children studying in the same stage of education in different subjects
Children continuing professional studies in a different stream
Children under full employment during the period of study
documents_required: Two passport-size photographs with signature of student
Receipt of previous year's scholarship (if applicable)
Annual Course Fee from the School/Institute
Clearance Certificate by the Head of the Institution
Verification/Information Certificate by the Head of the Institution

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The objective is to provide financial assistance to children of construction workers to enable them to complete their education.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Children of construction workers registered under the Meghalaya Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board are eligible for the scholarship.

faqs.question: What are the benefits provided under this scholarship?
faqs.answer: The scholarship includes stipends ranging from ₹400 to ₹1,600 per month depending on the level of study, along with one-time book and uniform grants.

faqs.question: How can the application be submitted?
faqs.answer: Applications can be made online at http://megbocwwb.gov.in/bocw_services
